page.title: 14Jobs in Tenbury 3
page.content: My Dad is a Pewter Smith he works at Bewdly Museum on Monday Wednesday and Sundays or Saturdays.He works from half past nine to half past four and he gets home at about five o,clock. He does his casting,soldering and most of his shaping at his workshop in the museum. He does engraving and polishing at home. He makes:_ Snuff Boxes, Trinket Boxes, Bud Vases, Tankards, Scarf Rings, Thimbles, Condiment Sets, Candle Sticks, Bangles, Rings, Jugs and Teapots. A school survey showed: 10 Dads are Council Workers,53 Factory Workers, 37 Farmers or Farm Workers,1 Game Keeper, 27 Engineers, 2 Barmen, 2 Bankworkers, 1 Fireman, 3 Policemen, 1 Doctor 1 Teacher, 7 Shopworkers, 5 Electricians, 10 Builders, 72 Other jobs and Unemployed, 54 Dads work out of Tenbury and 119 in Tenbury.
